entry.title: Install Maven on Ubuntu14
entry.content:
Download maven mv Downloads/apache-maven-3.3.3-bin.tar.gz /usr/local/ cd /usr/local/ sudo tar -xvf apache-maven-3.3.3-bin.tar.gz sudo rm apache-maven-3.3.3-bin.tar.gz

cd nano .profile # add at the end export M2_HOME="/usr/local/apache-maven-3.3.3" export PATH=${PATH}:${M2_HOME}/bin

Have a test source .profile mvn --version
